overview: Dave Bacic brings 20 years of transportation industry experience to the Vice President of National Sales position. His background is all-encompassing with sales, management, operations and logistics. In 1999, Dave launched and successfully developed our Georgia terminal, and in 2003, he was integrated into the corporate facilities as he embraced the operations management role. As VP of National Sales, Dave and his saleforce continue to build Beavex by developing new business relationships in diversified markets, and by supporting current clients on a daily basis.
